title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 272.5 - Consideration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 272.5 - Consideration

State Regulations

The licensee shall pay the State for the privilege granted
by such license at a per cubic yard rate for each and every cubic yard of
material taken under such license as shall be fixed and determined by the

Commissioner of General Services. On or before the 10th day of each and every
month that such license is in effect the licensee shall make payment to the

State for the privilege granted at the rate so fixed for the period ending on
the last day of the preceding month, payment to be made by certified check
payable to the Commissioner of General Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
272.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
